column2: IDEA-126094 Edit 'Before launch' entries with mouse left button double click

column3:
I've implemented this feature without suggested pull request, now you can setup custom shortcuts for standard actions ADD/REMOVE/EDIT/UP/DOWN (revision c519bc3)
Thank you anyway!
Thanks, then I think this one may be closed.
